d:namespace.name: http://www.backbase.com/2006/btl
d:namespace.d:resource: if(!window.btl){var btl={};}btl.namespaceURI='http://www.backbase.com/2006/btl';btl.funcReturnFalse=function btl_funcReturnFalse(){return false;};btl.funcReturnTrue=function btl_funcReturnTrue(){return true;};btl.isInsideHead=function btl_isInsideHead(oElm,oOrigNode,oTarget){if(oTarget&&oTarget!=oOrigNode){return false;}while(oElm&&oElm.nodeType==1){if(bb.html.hasClass(oElm,'btl-head')){return true;}if(oElm.controller==oOrigNode){break;}oElm=oElm.parentNode;}return false;};btl.repaint=function btl_repaint(oElm){bb.html.addClass(oElm,'btl-repaint');setTimeout(function(){if(oElm){bb.html.removeClass(oElm,'btl-repaint');}oElm=null;},1);};btl.isTrueValue=function btl_isTrueValue(sName,sValue){return sValue=='true'||sValue==sName;};btl.isFalseValue=function btl_isFalseValue(sName,sValue){return sValue!='true'&&sValue!=sName;};btl.containsElement=function btl_containsElement(oElm1,oElm2){while(oElm2){if(oElm1==oElm2){return true;}oElm2=oElm2.parentNode;}return false;};btl.getScrollLeft=function btl_getScrollLeft(oElm){var iScrollLeft=0;while(oElm){if(oElm.scrollLeft){iScrollLeft+=oElm.scrollLeft;}oElm=oElm.parentNode;}return iScrollLeft;};btl.getScrollTop=function btl_getScrollTop(oElm){var iScrollTop=0;while(oElm){if(oElm.scrollTop){iScrollTop+=oElm.scrollTop;}oElm=oElm.parentNode;}return iScrollTop;};btl.setPrivateProperty=function btl_setPrivateProperty(oController,sProperty,value){oController._['_btl_'+sProperty]=value;};btl.getPrivateProperty=function btl_getPrivateProperty(oController,sProperty){return oController._['_btl_'+sProperty];};btl.html={};btl.html.stretch=function btl_html_stretch(oElm){var oParent=oElm.parentNode;oElm.style.height='1px';var iHeightBefore;var iStretchTop;var iFirstTop;var iHeightAfter;var iLastTop;var iLastHeight;var iAfterStretchTop;var iAvailableHeight=bb.html.getBoxObject(oParent,'content').height;var iStretchHeight;var oChild=oParent.firstChild;var oStretch;while(oChild){var bValidChild=oChild.nodeType===1&&bb.html.getStyle(oChild,'position')!=='absolute'&&bb.html.getStyle(oChild,'display')!=='none';var oNextSibling=oChild.nextSibling;if(bValidChild){var oBoxObject=bb.html.getBoxObject(oChild);if(iFirstTop===undefined){iFirstTop=oBoxObject.top;}if(iStretchTop===undefined&&oChild===oElm){oStretch=oChild;iStretchTop=oBoxObject.top;iHeightBefore=iStretchTop-iFirstTop;iHeightAfter=0;}else{if(iStretchTop!==undefined&&iAfterStretchTop===undefined){iAfterStretchTop=oBoxObject.top;iHeightAfter=oBoxObject.height;}else{iLastTop=oBoxObject.top;iLastHeight=oBoxObject.height;iHeightAfter=iLastTop+iLastHeight-iAfterStretchTop;}}}oChild=oNextSibling;}iStretchHeight=iAvailableHeight-iHeightBefore-iHeightAfter;if(oElm&&iStretchHeight){btl.html.setHeight(oElm,iStretchHeight);}};btl.html.setHeight=function btl_html_setHeight(oElm,iHeight){iHeight-=bb.html.getStyle(oElm,'box-sizing')=='content-box'?bb.html.getBoxObject(oElm,'border').height-bb.html.getBoxObject(oElm,'content').height:0;bb.html.setStyle(oElm,'height',iHeight+'px');};btl.html.setWidth=function btl_html_setWidth(oElm,iWidth){iWidth-=bb.html.getStyle(oElm,'box-sizing')=='content-box'?bb.html.getBoxObject(oElm,'border').width-bb.html.getBoxObject(oElm,'content').width:0;bb.html.setStyle(oElm,'width',iWidth+'px');};btl.controller={};btl.controller.containsElement=function btl_controller_containsElement(oAncestor,oDescendant){while(oDescendant){oDescendant=oDescendant.getProperty('parentNode');if(oAncestor===oDescendant){return true;}}return false;};
